thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 3 of 699
thread.title: PETER SEBASTIAN
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by PETER SEBASTIAN

author: PETER SEBASTIAN
title: PETER SEBASTIAN
text: The car was clean and comfortable, everything you would expect. The genuinely friendly service was what made a difference. Hobart airport redspot staff are to be commended. The lady at the desk, and the guys bringing in the vehicles esp. Sometimes a genuine smile is the thing you remember most about a holiday.
